page.title: 16GADGETS
page.content: In 1985 people in this area have equipped their houses with many gadgets to make life easier. They have cooking aids like mixers,liqidisers, electric carving knives, chippers and tin openers. There are tumble dryers and washing machines, electric and rotary irons to smooth clothes. We have vacuum cleaners to suck up dust to help with housework. Ladies have hair driers, rollers and tongs to curl their hair! There are electric toothbrushes and shavers that you find in the bathroom. Many people tend to do do-it-yourself jobs around the home to improve their houses. Tools used include power drills and screw drivers, power saws, grinding wheels and sanders. Many households have a number of tools for home improvements. These are kept in the garage or workshop.
